comment: Excellent explanation of BRCA1 variant with clear risk breakdown and management implications
Good explanation of VUS but could have mentioned reclassification resources like ClinVar monthly updates
Perfect explanation of autosomal recessive inheritance with clear Punnett square logic
Helpful but would benefit from including newborn screening considerations for Pompe disease
Explanation was too technical for a layperson, needed simpler language for penetrance concept
Cited appropriate resources and guidelines, very professional
Good variant interpretation but missed discussing enzyme replacement therapy as treatment option
Excellent distinction between carrier and affected status, clear family testing recommendations
Would be helpful to include more information about psychosocial aspects of genetic testing
Perfect use of HGVS nomenclature and clear explanation of inheritance patterns
